content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Copper Cable Factory at position (2, 2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (2.0, 2.0)
- Inserter at position (2.0, 2.0) that puts into the assembling machine

### Electricity Generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Boiler at position (0.0, 1.0)
- Offshore pump at position (0.0, -1.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting to craft or operate any machines.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
